meanings.definition: The sloping side of a hill.
meanings.sent1: The cows grazed peacefully on the hillsides.
meanings.sent2: We hiked up the hillsides to get a better view of the valley below.
meanings.sent3: The hillsides seemed to be whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the hillsides glowed like embers in a fire.
meanings.sent5: The hillsides rolled like waves frozen in time.

meanings.definition: The area of land that slopes down from a hill.
meanings.sent1: The houses on the hillsides had stunning views of the city.
meanings.sent2: Rainwater flowed down the hillsides, creating small streams.
meanings.sent3: The hillsides played hide and seek with the setting sun.
meanings.sent4: In the distance, the hillsides looked like a giant green blanket.
meanings.sent5: The hillsides embraced the valley below in a gentle hug.
